```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
waste_vs_gdp <- read_csv("waste-vs-gdp.csv") %>% janitor::clean_names()
mismanaged_vs_gdp <- read_csv("mismanaged_vs_gdp.csv") %>% janitor::clean_names()
coast_vs_waste <- read_csv("coast_vs_waste.csv") %>% janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(coast_vs_waste)
```

```{r}
coast_vs_waste %>% 
  filter(!is.na(coastal_population) & !is.na(total_population_gapminder)) %>% 
  #filter(coastal_population > total_population_gapminder)

  glimpse() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = total_population_gapminder, y = coastal_population, color = year)) +
    geom_point() + 
    geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0)
```
